name: @vadzim/readstream
description: read all stream to a promise
author: Vadzim Zie≈Ñka <developer@vadzim.info>

scripts.build: flow && rm distr/* && babel source --out-dir distr && cd distr && (for f in $(find | grep -E '.js$'); do if grep @flow ../source/$f >/dev/null; then cp ../source/$f $f.flow; fi; done) && cd ..
scripts.go: npm run prettier && npm run build && npm run test
